title: Jimbo

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, give a player a blind.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Giving a player a blind will have them play a round of Balatro, moderated by the host, with 5 random jokers given by the host.
- This will roleblock them (for obvious reasons.)
- If they win the blind, they get a buff as determined by the host.
- If they lose, you attack them.
- Blind scores are 450+150x where x is the night number.

desc:
Post 5443
*"I'm literally a fool, What's your excuse?"*
